lines.ja: 高い峰の頂に安置されている
決して軽んじてはならない

lines.en: The moon is veiled by drifting clouds

lines.ja: 行いは自ら迷いに陥る
lines.en: Actions fall into confusion on their own

lines.ja: 幸いにして陰公の加護を願い
lines.en: Luckily, seek the protection of Lord Yin

lines.ja: 何を憂いて眉をひそめようか
lines.en: Why worry and furrow the brow

lines.ja: 憂い悩みは忠良を損なう
lines.en: Sorrow and worry harm the loyal and good

lines.ja: 青空に一本の香を焚く
lines.en: Burning a stick of incense to the blue sky

lines.ja: たとえ小さな過ちを防いでも
lines.en: Even if small faults are guarded against

lines.ja: 閑かな思いは時を長く感じさせる
lines.en: Idle thoughts make time feel long

lines.ja: 君の恩恵はまだ封じられず
もし侯の手印に出会えば
lines.en: If you encounter the lord's seal,
Good fortune will begin to unfold.
The household's path has yet to thrive,

lines.ja: 危うくして災いを保つ

lines.en: Dark clouds encroach upon the laurel,
A beauty offers a single stick of incense.
On the boat, I await the wind
The moonlight is dim and hazy
I long to move the fragrant wheel
Do not see the head, but the tail

lines.ja: 文と華は理を得るべし
lines.en: Words and beauty must find reason

lines.ja: 稲と刃は偶然に出会う
lines.en: Grain and blade meet by chance

lines.ja: 非常の喜びに出会うべし
三つの望みが一朝に変わる
lines.en: Three hopes transform in a day,
A noble guide arrives to show,

lines.ja: 華やかな果実は時に応じて鮮やか
lines.en: Flourishing fruits bloom in their time.
Amidst the layers of frost's bite
The east wind revives old branches,
Ascending the ladder to the clouds.
Yet blooms cling to the dead.
Illness lingers, no recovery in sight
The shore is perilous, the boat stays moored
The dragon sleeps, losing its precious pearl
A new path is forged ahead,
Joy and peace await the future,

lines.ja: 助けてくれる人がいて

lines.en: A cup of wine brings idleness.
From darkness to light we rise,
The hempen robe turns to green,
Thorns grow along the home path
Descendants guard against the tiger's might
Prayers before incense bring blessings near
Thus, separation is kept at bay.
Wealth at home begins to thrive,
What words can speak of delays,

lines.ja: 変わりゆく中で名を成す
lines.en: In change, one finds success alive.
Wash away the years of worry,
Once more, the light shines clear,

lines.ja: 求めるものは必ず得て
lines.en: What you seek will surely come,

lines.ja: 明るい日が未来を照らす
lines.en: Bright days illuminate the path ahead.
The moon shines bright once more,
An arrow pierces the blue sky
Yet the path ahead is long.
The path ahead brings sure gain

lines.ja: また良き人の矢を得て

lines.en: A general hears a strange sound
Marching troops stretch far and wide
Who knows the moment of confrontation?
Wishing for fortune on the peaks
Gaze upward at the bright moon
Trust not the depths of waves,
Reflect on the path once walked,
You shall meet a noble soul.
The crane stands on high boughs,

lines.ja: 井のほとりで刀を研ぎ
lines.en: By the well, the blade is sharpened,

lines.ja: 家の中でも危険を防ぐ
lines.en: Within the home, keep dangers at bay.
Winds and clouds stir great waves,

lines.ja: 玉のように深く隠れた石
lines.en: A stone hidden deep like jade,

lines.ja: 古い目で見るのはやめて
lines.en: Do not view it with old eyes,
Only then is the treasure's light revealed.
Flowers bloom anew in the woods
The moon appears between the clouds
A noble friend comes into view
The whale stirs the great waves

lines.ja: 釣り糸を上げて真の恵み
鹿を射るには矢を乗せよ
lines.en: To hunt the deer, let arrows guide you,
An old monk leads the way back home,

lines.ja: 道に出会い仙籍を同じくし
lines.en: Meeting the path, sharing the sage's fate,
Radiance reflects in the evening glow.
The jade rabbit waits to rise,
While brilliance fills the room wide.
A change must come to pass,

lines.ja: 月明かり静かに天の書を照らし
lines.en: The moonlight quietly illuminates the heavenly script

lines.ja: 雲が生み出す霧と彩霞
lines.en: Clouds give birth to mist and colorful haze

lines.ja: 長く離れた庭の客を思い
lines.en: Longing for the guest who left the garden

lines.ja: 無事であることに感謝の声が集まる
lines.en: Gratitude gathers for the safety we hold
In the jar, a cure waits
Prepare for a loss of half,
On a clear path beneath the clouds,
The dark moon shines bright once more.
The laurel's shadow fills the air
A noble one comes from afar
On the board, black and white,
A beauty closes her door alone
Fortune glimpsed by the stream ahead,
Rest your troubled mind from its maze,

lines.ja: ある朝、良き渡しに出会い
lines.en: One morning, a good crossing awaits,

lines.ja: 鳳凰が雲に舞い上がる
lines.en: As phoenixes soar into the clouds.
Where do the dark clouds hide?
Only then to meet high branches.
In times of calamity, lament not.

lines.ja: 長い苦しみを経て安らぎ
雲に書かれた印が降りる
lines.en: A cloud inscribes a mark from above,
The last blooms bear fruit at last,
In due time, fortune shifts its course.
The wheel may rest in hand,
Clouds disperse, the moon shines bright
In heaven's script, true intent is found
Flowers bloom again, their glory unbound
Life brings both joy and sorrow
Before old age, white hair appears
A fragrant meeting with a noble friend
Desiring to cross the Yangtze wide,
The waves are deep, I stand alone,
At the front dock, calm waters meet,
I ready my hook for the next cast.

lines.ja: 行き先も安らかでない

lines.en: A single moon shines bright and clear,

lines.ja: しかし黒雲に覆われる
lines.en: Yet dark clouds ride upon its glow.
Do not cross the high and perilous
A level path leads to longevity
Uphold the way for peace to find you
Winds and clouds are not mere chance

lines.ja: 過去の過ち、いつ解消するか
lines.en: When will past errors be resolved?
Within the home, elegance is preserved.

lines.ja: 十一の口に、出会うことを求め
lines.en: Seek an encounter at the eleventh hour,

lines.ja: 鼠に出会い、牛の傍を通る
lines.en: Meeting the mouse, passing by the cow.
Renew the old for new fortune,
As the Pleiades rise, blessings come.

lines.ja: 安らかに暮らしつつ危険を思う
lines.en: Live in peace, yet fear the threat
Deep affection leads to parting's ache
Winds swirl, waves rise in haste

lines.ja: 鴛鴦はそれぞれ飛び去る
lines.en: Mandarin ducks each take their flight

lines.ja: 苦しみと病、辱めを防ぎ
lines.en: Suffering and illness, guard against disgrace,

lines.ja: 危機を乗り越え、まだ終わらず

lines.en: If you see the light of day,

lines.ja: 良い計画を立てるべし
lines.en: Then you may craft a good plan.
The water lies still, waves are few,
A flying goose drops a feather,
Trivial matters stir up the breeze.
Bare branches on a dead tree
Alone I walk the clouded path

lines.ja: 異なる夢に英傑生まれ
前に来る事は疑わしき
lines.en: Doubt lingers in what comes ahead,
Fragrant spring days warm the air,

lines.ja: 依然として残る枝に花咲く
lines.en: Yet blossoms still on branches bare.

lines.ja: 舟を漕ぐ、遠くを図るな
lines.en: Row your boat, do not seek afar
Flames soar high into the sky
With a single heart for fortune
Yet fate shuts the crimson door
Within the home, ward off woes,
Is the time for harmony at last.
Long darkness gives way to light
A scroll descends on the grass

lines.ja: ついに異なる人と出会う
lines.en: At last, I meet someone new

lines.ja: 年が交わると喜びが生まれ
lines.en: As the year turns, joy is born,

lines.ja: 上下の調和は得られず
孤舟が岸を越えんとし
lines.en: A lone boat seeks the shore,
In rushing waves, no one can cross.
A woman stands by the flowing stream,

lines.ja: 月を見上げて思い深し
lines.en: Gazing at the moon, her thoughts run deep.
Wealth and honor are heaven's grace
No need for toil or strife
The path ahead will surely show
With patience, you will rise high.
Stuck in place, unable to move,
Though I set sail on rushing waves,
The path ahead feels distant and barred.
In the front hills, wealth abounds.
Pray to guard the bright sun.
When paths align, success will follow

lines.ja: 新たな悩みが旧い過ちを呼ぶ

lines.en: No boat to cross the waters
Stepping forth from the clouds above

lines.ja: 高い枝には手が届かず
lines.en: The high branches remain out of reach

lines.ja: 頭を上げて月を見れば
lines.en: Looking up to see the bright moon
Seeking fame, peace comes in time.
A ladder of clouds holds hope ahead.
The homeward path leads to paradise.
Flowers bloom in the sun's embrace,
Wagons roll forth, wealth in chase.

lines.ja: 文を持ち帝殿に向かい
lines.en: With scroll in hand, to the palace we tread,

lines.ja: 馬を走らせ雷の音を聞く
lines.en: On galloping steeds, we hear thunder's spread.

lines.ja: 砂を淘して金を見出す

lines.en: In the blue sky, a path exists,

lines.ja: ただ心が揺らがぬかが恐ろしい

lines.en: Now is the time to refine
A message soars to the sky,
The boat on Qin River returns on its own,
The path ahead brings good fortune,

lines.ja: 貴人の助けを得るべし
lines.en: With the support of noble friends.

lines.ja: 雲の中から栄光が訪れる
すべての事はまず始めるべし

lines.en: An arrow soars to the sky.
Fish appear in the dry pond

lines.ja: 小者との交わりを防げ
幸いに陰の助けを乞え
敵の事を免れるために

lines.en: When you hear the golden call,
Set sail and catch the favorable wind.

lines.ja: 鶏が鳳凰を追いかける
lines.en: The chicken chases the phoenix high,
In tall trees, feathers are arranged,
Rowing the boat, we reach the shore,
With treasures full, we return home.
A beauty glides on water's flow,
White clouds trace a path to depart,

lines.ja: 新たな糸を整えたいが
lines.en: Desiring to weave new threads anew,

lines.ja: 悩みが多くて静かに過ごす
出会う人は皆悲しみを抱える
lines.en: Each meeting brings a shared despair.
The red sun shines at the gate
Bringing joy to the heart's field
With a lute I roam the distant hills,
My thoughts drift in vain allure.
